title: Who Speaks for the Lazy?- rhetorical analysis

content.question: Which statement provides the best rhetorical analysis of the first sentence (Paragraph 1)?

choices.label: The author betrays a sense of resentment by using the modification "even before."
The author adopts an authoritative stance on the topic by beginning with "There is."
The author defines the scope of his argument by referring to "all offers."
The author expresses his anger by selecting the confrontational verb "smacks."

content.answer: The author adopts an authoritative stance on the topic by beginning with "There is."

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
